name: Multi-Flow Test
diagram:
sequenceDiagram
    title: Order Processing with Color-Coded Flows
    %%flow happy_path "Happy Path" #22C55E
    %%flow error_flow "Error Flow" #EF4444
    %%flow retry_flow "Retry Flow" #F59E0B

    participant Client
    participant API as API Gateway
    participant Payment
    participant DB as Database

    Client->>API: Create Order @flow(happy_path) @path(POST /orders)
    API->>Payment: Process Payment @flow(happy_path)
    Payment-->>API: Payment Success @flow(happy_path)
    API->>DB: Save Order @flow(happy_path)
    DB-->>API: Order Saved @flow(happy_path)
    API-->>Client: Order Created @flow(happy_path)

    Client->>API: Create Order @flow(error_flow) @path(POST /orders)
    API->>Payment: Process Payment @flow(error_flow)
    Payment-->>API: Payment Failed @flow(error_flow)
    API-->>Client: Order Failed @flow(error_flow)

    Client->>API: Create Order @flow(retry_flow) @path(POST /orders)
    API->>Payment: Process Payment @flow(retry_flow)
    Payment-->>API: Timeout @flow(retry_flow)
    API->>Payment: Retry Payment @flow(retry_flow)
    Payment-->>API: Payment Success @flow(retry_flow)
    API-->>Client: Order Created @flow(retry_flow)
